page.title: 18YHA, FAIRLIGHT, EAST SUSSEX
page.content:
The Fairlight, Guestling, Pett area of East Sussex has a youth hostel. It is on the A.259 main Hastings to Rye road at Guestling. Guestling Hall Youth Hostel has 64 beds and is a Standard grade hostel. Evening meals are provided and there is a store at the hostel. The hostel is open all year except January, and Mondays from September to June. The overnight fee at a Standard grade hostel for under 5 years is Â£2.00, 16-21 years is Â£2.35 and 21+ years is Â£3.05. The charge for an evening meal is Â£1.80.
The Youth Hostel Association was founded to help people of limited means to a greater knowledge, love and care of the countryside by providing hostels, and so promote health, rest a and education.
